lyrics:
3 contributorstell it to the volcano lyricsverse 1

now that youre finally gone i am free to
get on with my life oh oh oh oh
you can summon all the guys
that your black heart desires
they can not help you cause theyre starting fires
to burn you alive

verse 2

you were breaking my heart shrinking my head
i couldnt get out of my bed
